Steps to reproduce the behavior:

```javascript

const transformer = require('node-es-transformer');

});
```

## Expected behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Actual behavior

What actually happened. Include error messages if any.

- node-es-transformer version: [e.g., 1.0.0]
